task_list.instruction_title: Please set the SECLI EVx (PROD-Like) users in read only mode
Please PUT ON HOLD / DO NOT EXECUTE the SECLI batch jobs from from Tuesday until Sunday on CSD migration week

\"Communication SECLI Satellites: Done by SECLI
Direct satellites have been informed and have taken action to have a smooth adaptation (Appway Secret will be unplugged, Appway Credit Protocol only reads data, etc.)\"
